casebody.data:
IN RE Resignation of SCUDDER 2018-1138 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 4, 2018

DISCIPLINARY CASE

Sua sponte, Steven C. Scudder, Attorney Registration No. 0044134, last known business address in Centerville, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to surrender his certificate of admission and failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before October 22, 2018.
